api_client.syntax: CREATE TABLE `api_client` ( `id` int unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `client_secret` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `client_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `default_channel_id` smallint DEFAULT NULL, `active` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `client_secret` (`client_secret`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

article.syntax: CREATE TABLE `article` ( `id` int unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `title` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `description` text CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci, `vat_group_id` smallint unsigned NOT NULL, `main_group_id` smallint unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `post_group_id` smallint unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `options` int unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `quantity` smallint NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `amount` decimal(5,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

config.syntax: CREATE TABLE `config` ( `entity_id` smallint unsigned NOT NULL, `module` char(20) NOT NULL, `name` char(30) NOT NULL, `language_id` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `value` text NOT NULL, `json_encoded` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`entity_id`,`module`,`name`,`language_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

country.syntax: CREATE TABLE `country` ( `id` smallint unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `code` char(2) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `code3` char(3) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `name` varchar(80) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `icon` char(10) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `phone_code` smallint unsigned NOT NULL, `zipcode_pattern` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `zipcode_example` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `zipcode_format` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `europe` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `iso` (`code`), UNIQUE KEY `name` (`name`), UNIQUE KEY `iso3` (`code3`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

customer.syntax: CREATE TABLE `customer` ( `id` int unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `entity_id` smallint unsigned NOT NULL, `customer_number` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `name` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `payment_method_id` smallint unsigned NOT NULL, `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `entity_id` (`entity_id`,`customer_number`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

customer_address.syntax: CREATE TABLE `customer_address` ( `customer_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `customer_department_id` int unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `address` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `address_number` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `address_number_suffix` char(20) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `zipcode` char(10) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `city` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT '', `country_id` tinyint unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `phone_number` bigint unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `email_address` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `email_address_invoice` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `coc_number` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `vat_number` char(20) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, UNIQUE KEY `customer_id` (`customer_id`), KEY `customer_department_id` (`customer_department_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

customer_contact.syntax: CREATE TABLE `customer_contact` ( `id` int unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `customer_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `customer_department_id` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `name_title` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name_first` char(30) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `name_prefix` char(30) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `name_last` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `country_id` tinyint unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `language_id` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL, `phone_number` bigint unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `email_address` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `customer_id` (`customer_id`), KEY `customer_department_id` (`customer_department_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

customer_department.syntax: CREATE TABLE `customer_department` ( `id` int unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `customer_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `email_address` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `language_id` tinyint unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `customer_id` (`customer_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

customer_to_entity.syntax: CREATE TABLE `customer_to_entity` ( `customer_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `entity_id` int NOT NULL, UNIQUE KEY `customer_id` (`customer_id`,`entity_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

document.syntax: CREATE TABLE `document` ( `id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `date` date DEFAULT NULL, `title` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `description` text CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci, `company` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `reference` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `test` int unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, PRIMARY KEY (`test`), UNIQUE KEY `id` (`id`,`date`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

document_label.syntax: CREATE TABLE `document_label` ( `id` int unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `description` text CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL, `user_created` int DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

document_to_label.syntax: CREATE TABLE `document_to_label` ( `document_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `document_label_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`document_id`,`document_label_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

document_to_upload.syntax: CREATE TABLE `document_to_upload` ( `document_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `upload_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`document_id`,`upload_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

entity.syntax: CREATE TABLE `entity` ( `id` int unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `code` char(30) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `name` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

folio.syntax: CREATE TABLE `folio` ( `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `entity_id` smallint unsigned NOT NULL, `customer_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `customer_department_id` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `customer_contact_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `description` text CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci, `period_start` date DEFAULT NULL, `period_type` date DEFAULT NULL, `date_start` date DEFAULT NULL, `date_end` date DEFAULT NULL, `frequency_type` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `vat_reversed` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `hide_quantity` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `show_contact_attention` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `show_contact_reference` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `reference` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `active` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `customer_id` (`customer_id`), KEY `entity_id` (`entity_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

folio_line.syntax: CREATE TABLE `folio_line` ( `id` int unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `folio_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `article_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `title` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `description` text CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci, `quantity` decimal(7,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1.00', `amount` decimal(5,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `frequency_value` smallint DEFAULT NULL, `frequency_type` tinyint DEFAULT NULL, `period_start` date DEFAULT NULL, `date_next` date DEFAULT NULL, `date_last` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `sort_order` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `folio_id` (`folio_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

folio_to_upload.syntax: CREATE TABLE `folio_to_upload` ( `folio_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `upload_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`folio_id`,`upload_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

invoice.syntax: CREATE TABLE `invoice` ( `id` int unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `entity_id` smallint unsigned NOT NULL, `customer_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `customer_department_id` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `customer_contact_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `secret_id` char(32) DEFAULT NULL, `invoice_number` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `invoice_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `folio_id` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `date_expire` date DEFAULT NULL, `total_gross` decimal(6,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `total_net` decimal(6,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `language_id` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL, `vat_reversed` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `hide_quantity` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `paid_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `paid_amount` decimal(6,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `credit_amount` decimal(6,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `credit` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `parent_invoice_id` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `reminder_count` tinyint unsigned DEFAULT '0', `payment_method_id` smallint unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `show_contact_attention` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `show_contact_reference` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `reference` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `secret_id` (`secret_id`), UNIQUE KEY `invoice_number` (`entity_id`,`invoice_number`), KEY `customer` (`customer_id`,`customer_department_id`,`customer_contact_id`), KEY `entity_id` (`entity_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

invoice_address.syntax: CREATE TABLE `invoice_address` ( `invoice_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `company_name` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `department_name` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `contactperson_title` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `contactperson_name_first` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `contactperson_name_prefix` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `contactperson_name_last` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `address` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `address_number` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `address_number_suffix` char(30) COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `zipcode` char(10) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `city` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `country_id` smallint unsigned NOT NULL, `vat_number` char(20) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `user_created` int DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`invoice_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

invoice_line.syntax: CREATE TABLE `invoice_line` ( `id` int unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `invoice_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `article_id` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `title` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `description` text CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci, `period_start` date DEFAULT NULL, `period_end` date DEFAULT NULL, `quantity` decimal(7,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1.00', `amount` decimal(6,2) DEFAULT NULL, `vat_rate` decimal(4,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `credit_quantity` decimal(7,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `credit_amount` decimal(6,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `separator` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `indent` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `sort_order` tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `invoice_id` (`invoice_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

invoice_payment.syntax: CREATE TABLE `invoice_payment` ( `id` int unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `invoice_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `payment_method_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `amount` decimal(6,2) NOT NULL, `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int DEFAULT NULL, `date_payment` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `invoice_id` (`invoice_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

invoice_period.syntax: CREATE VIEW `invoice_period` AS select year(`i`.`invoice_date`) AS `year`,quarter(`i`.`invoice_date`) AS `quarter`,`il`.`vat_rate` AS `vat_rate`,cast(sum(((`il`.`amount` * `il`.`quantity`) * ((`il`.`vat_rate` / 100) + 1))) as decimal(7,2)) AS `total_gross`,cast(sum((`il`.`amount` * `il`.`quantity`)) as decimal(7,2)) AS `total_net`,cast(sum(((`il`.`amount` * `il`.`quantity`) * (`il`.`vat_rate` / 100))) as decimal(7,2)) AS `total_vat` from (`invoice_line` `il` join `invoice` `i` on((`il`.`invoice_id` = `i`.`id`))) group by concat(quarter(`i`.`invoice_date`),'-',year(`i`.`invoice_date`)),`il`.`vat_rate` order by `year`,`quarter`

invoice_send.syntax: CREATE TABLE `invoice_send` ( `id` int unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `invoice_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `secret_id` char(16) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL, `email_address` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `seen_count` smallint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `reminder_count` smallint NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `invoice_id` (`invoice_id`), KEY `secret_id` (`secret_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

invoice_statistic_month.syntax: CREATE VIEW `invoice_statistic_month` AS select `i`.`entity_id` AS `entity_id`,year(`i`.`invoice_date`) AS `year`,month(`i`.`invoice_date`) AS `month`,quarter(`i`.`invoice_date`) AS `quarter`,`il`.`vat_rate` AS `vat_percentage`,cast(sum(((`il`.`amount` * `il`.`quantity`) * ((`il`.`vat_rate` / 100) + 1))) as decimal(7,2)) AS `total_gross`,cast(sum((`il`.`amount` * `il`.`quantity`)) as decimal(7,2)) AS `total_net`,cast(sum(((`il`.`amount` * `il`.`quantity`) * (`il`.`vat_rate` / 100))) as decimal(7,2)) AS `total_vat` from (`invoice_line` `il` join `invoice` `i` on((`il`.`invoice_id` = `i`.`id`))) group by concat(year(`i`.`invoice_date`),'-',month(`i`.`invoice_date`)),`il`.`vat_rate` order by `year`,`month`,`vat_percentage`

invoice_to_upload.syntax: CREATE TABLE `invoice_to_upload` ( `invoice_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `upload_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`invoice_id`,`upload_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

language.syntax: CREATE TABLE `language` ( `id` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `icon` char(20) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `name` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `code` char(2) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `accept_locale` char(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `system_locale` char(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `href_lang` char(30) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `directory` char(5) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `directory_fallback` char(5) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `mollie_code` char(5) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `status` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `visible` tinyint unsigned DEFAULT '1', `sort_order` tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

payment_method.syntax: CREATE TABLE `payment_method` ( `id` int unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `image` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `mollie_id` char(20) DEFAULT NULL, `issuer` char(20) DEFAULT NULL, `direct_debit` tinyint unsigned DEFAULT '0', `fee_value` double(4,2) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `active` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `visible` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `sort_order` tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

payment_method_condition.syntax: CREATE TABLE `payment_method_condition` ( `payment_method_id` smallint unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `language_id` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL, `condition` text CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL, `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`payment_method_id`), UNIQUE KEY `payment_method_id` (`payment_method_id`,`language_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

purchase.syntax: CREATE TABLE `purchase` ( `id` int unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `entity_id` smallint unsigned NOT NULL, `invoice_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `description` text CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci, `company` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `reference` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `hard_copy` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `vat_shifted` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `total_net` decimal(7,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `total_gross` decimal(7,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `total_no_vat` decimal(7,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `invoice_date` (`invoice_date`), KEY `entity_id` (`entity_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

purchase_amount.syntax: CREATE TABLE `purchase_amount` ( `id` int unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `purchase_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `vat_group_id` smallint unsigned NOT NULL, `vat_percentage` double(4,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `amount` decimal(7,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `amount_gross` decimal(7,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `purchase_id` (`purchase_id`,`vat_group_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

purchase_period.syntax: CREATE VIEW `purchase_period` AS select year(`p`.`invoice_date`) AS `year`,quarter(`p`.`invoice_date`) AS `quarter`,sum(`pa`.`amount_gross`) AS `total_gross`,sum(`pa`.`amount`) AS `total_net`,sum((`pa`.`amount_gross` - `pa`.`amount`)) AS `total_vat`,`pa`.`vat_percentage` AS `vat_percentage` from (`purchase_amount` `pa` join `purchase` `p` on((`pa`.`purchase_id` = `p`.`id`))) group by concat(quarter(`p`.`invoice_date`),'-',year(`p`.`invoice_date`)),`pa`.`vat_percentage` order by `year`,`quarter`

purchase_statistic_month.syntax: CREATE VIEW `purchase_statistic_month` AS select `p`.`entity_id` AS `entity_id`,year(`p`.`invoice_date`) AS `year`,month(`p`.`invoice_date`) AS `month`,quarter(`p`.`invoice_date`) AS `quarter`,`pa`.`vat_percentage` AS `vat_percentage`,sum(`pa`.`amount_gross`) AS `total_gross`,sum(`pa`.`amount`) AS `total_net`,sum((`pa`.`amount_gross` - `pa`.`amount`)) AS `total_vat` from (`purchase_amount` `pa` join `purchase` `p` on((`pa`.`purchase_id` = `p`.`id`))) group by `p`.`entity_id`,concat(year(`p`.`invoice_date`),'-',month(`p`.`invoice_date`)),`pa`.`vat_percentage` order by `year`,`month`,`pa`.`vat_percentage`

purchase_to_upload.syntax: CREATE TABLE `purchase_to_upload` ( `purchase_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `upload_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`purchase_id`,`upload_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

quotation.syntax: CREATE TABLE `quotation` ( `id` int unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `customer_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `customer_department_id` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `customer_contact_id` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `quotation_number` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `quotation_number_revision` smallint unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `quotation_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `name` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL, `description` text CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci, `valid_value` tinyint unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `valid_type` tinyint unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `show_attention` tinyint unsigned DEFAULT '1', `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `quotation_number` (`quotation_number`,`quotation_number_revision`), KEY `quotation_date` (`quotation_date`), KEY `customer_id` (`customer_id`,`customer_department_id`,`customer_contact_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

quotation_address.syntax: CREATE TABLE `quotation_address` ( `quotation_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `company_name` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `contactperson_name_title` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `contactperson_name_first` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `contactperson_name_prefix` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `contactperson_name_last` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `address` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `address_number` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `address_number_suffix` char(30) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `zipcode` char(30) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `city` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `country_id` smallint unsigned NOT NULL, `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`quotation_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

quotation_group.syntax: CREATE TABLE `quotation_group` ( `id` int unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `quotation_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `title` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `options` smallint NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `sort_order` tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `quotation_id` (`quotation_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

quotation_group_line.syntax: CREATE TABLE `quotation_group_line` ( `id` int unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `quotation_group_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `article_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `title` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `description` text CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci, `quantity` smallint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `amount` decimal(6,2) DEFAULT NULL, `amount_included` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `spacer` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `separator` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `indent` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `sort_order` tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `quotation_group_id` (`quotation_group_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

transaction.syntax: CREATE TABLE `transaction` ( `id` int unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `client_id` smallint unsigned NOT NULL, `transaction_reference` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `transaction_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `valuta_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `account_iban_number` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `contra_account_iban_number` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `contra_account_name` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `description` text CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci, `amount` decimal(7,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `no_invoice` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `client_id` (`client_id`,`transaction_reference`), KEY `transaction_date` (`transaction_date`), KEY `valuta_date` (`valuta_date`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

transaction_to_invoice.syntax: CREATE TABLE `transaction_to_invoice` ( `transaction_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `invoice_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`transaction_id`,`invoice_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

transaction_to_purchase.syntax: CREATE TABLE `transaction_to_purchase` ( `transaction_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `purchase_id` int unsigned NOT NULL, `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`transaction_id`,`purchase_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

translation.syntax: CREATE TABLE `translation` ( `id` int unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `language_id` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL, `table` char(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `table_id` bigint unsigned NOT NULL, `table_column` char(20) NOT NULL, `value` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `text` text, `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `language_id` (`language_id`,`table`,`table_id`,`table_column`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

upload.syntax: CREATE TABLE `upload` ( `id` bigint unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `client_id` smallint unsigned NOT NULL, `entity_id` smallint unsigned NOT NULL, `type` char(20) NOT NULL, `file_name` char(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `file_path` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `file_type` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `file_size` bigint unsigned NOT NULL, `image_width` smallint unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `image_height` smallint unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `image_rotate` smallint DEFAULT NULL, `caption` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `pending` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `md5_checksum` char(32) DEFAULT NULL, `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `company_id` (`entity_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

upload_pending_count.syntax: CREATE TABLE `upload_pending_count` ( `type` char(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `count` int unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`type`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

url_rewrite.syntax: CREATE TABLE `url_rewrite` ( `id` smallint unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `language_id` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL, `module` char(10) DEFAULT NULL, `url` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `route` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `mandatory` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `language_id_2` (`language_id`,`module`,`url`), KEY `language_id` (`language_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

user.syntax: CREATE TABLE `user` ( `id` int unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `username` char(100) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `password` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `name_title` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name_first` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `name_prefix` char(30) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `name_last` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `otp_token` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `active` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `date_last_login` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_last_otp` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_last_password` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `username` (`username`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

user_access_token.syntax: CREATE TABLE `user_access_token` ( `id` int unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_id` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `api_client_id` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `type` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `entity_id` smallint unsigned NOT NULL, `access_token` char(64) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `ip_address` varchar(25) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `date_expire` datetime NOT NULL, `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `access_token` (`access_token`), KEY `user_id` (`user_id`), KEY `api_client_id` (`api_client_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

vat_group.syntax: CREATE TABLE `vat_group` ( `id` int unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `title` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `description` text CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci, `amount` decimal(4,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `country_id` smallint unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_created` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `user_modified` int DEFAULT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `date_modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci
